name: Friday Night Funkin' 3D + Cursed
description:

Apparently ninja_muffin99 and phantomarcade's twitter account no longer exist?

Just Remade Friday Night Funkin' But 3D AND CURSED

Why i made it?

Just for fun, one day i was bored and my mind went like: hey lets remake Friday Night Funkin in 3D

M.I.L.F Is just fucked up right now, don't even play it, just don't please

Also long notes aren't a thing yet so they are replaced with notes lol

Only working music's are Ugh and Guns, Stress needs mapping and that's it

Difficulties only changes how much you gain and lose in the bar

Also there is a bug when you die itl'l go back to menu that says press to begin  

by the way i have no idea why i added Ugh Instrumental as a Menu Music

Controls:

W A S D

Up Key, Left Key, Down Key, Right Key
